node.title: Debate over massacre at historic homestead rages amid push to expand mine
node.alt: Grass leading up to a historic country home.
node.description: The Hunter Valley's colonial history looks set to impact its future, with Indigenous groups finding themselves at odds amid a proposed mine expansion.
node.content:
["Among\u00a0the dense patchwork of open-cut coal mines in the New South Wales Hunter Valley sits a sandstone colonial homestead dating back to the early 1800s.\u00a0", "Warning: This article contains content that some readers may find distressing.", "Its history could impact\u00a0the future of mining in the valley.", "Long before resource companies moved in to tap into the rich coal reserves below, surgeon James Bowman established the Ravensworth Estate in 1824 and it became a hub for horticultural experimentation.", "Among the last remaining artefacts of that era is the Ravensworth homestead, which\u00a0lies directly in the path of a proposed extension to Glencore's Glendell coal mine.", "The company has spent more than\u00a0$15 million formulating plans for the project, which include\u00a0moving the homestead to a nearby farm, or the town of Broke, 35km away.", "Glencore is seeking approval to build a new open-cut pit and mine an additional 135 million tonnes of coal until 2044.", "But a Wonnarua Indigenous group believes the project will cause the destruction of centuries of Aboriginal history.", "", "
The heritage protection application covers Hunter Valley coal mines including Liddell, Mount Owen, and Glendell.(ABC News)
", "
'The details are horrific'
", "Scott Franks, of the Plains Clans Wonnarua People (PCWP), believed\u00a0the colonial past of the Ravensworth\u00a0Estate\u00a0involved\u00a0the brutal massacre of First Nations people.", "\"The details are horrific \u2026 Cato [an Indigenous man] was impaled on the front fence of the homestead, the other warriors were hung from the neck,\" he said.", "Mr Franks declined the ABC's requests for an interview but spoke about the matter in a webinar hosted by NSW Greens MLC David Shoebridge.", "The PCWP has asked\u00a0federal Environment Minister Sussan Ley to use Aboriginal heritage laws to protect the countryside around Ravensworth from further mining.", "\"I'm just sad that such a beautiful area like the Hunter Valley is going to be turned into an unliveable landscape, ultimately, by the scourge of mining,\" Mr Franks said.", "", "
Laurie Perry says, based on oral history, claims of a massacre on the estate are \"totally ridiculous\".(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "
'There was no massacre on the site'
", "But a different local Indigenous group said Indigenous oral history did not prove a massacre at Ravensworth occurred.", "Wonnarua Nation Aboriginal Corporation chief executive Laurie Perry said there were \"tit-for-tat skirmishes\" on the land, but \"there was no massacre on the site or recorded massacre on the site\".", "\"We don't have a connection to this homestead or to this area at all,\" he said.", "Glencore and Mr Perry's corporation have an ongoing partnership, but Mr Perry denied\u00a0it created a possible conflict of interest.", "\"We don't have an established relationship with Glencore \u2014 we have an established relationship with every mining company and developer that operates in Hunter Valley,\" he said.", "\"We go through the normal processes of applying for funding if there's funding available, doesn't matter if it's from Glencore, Yancoal or Mach Energy.\"", "Another group, the Wanaruah Local Aboriginal Land Council, declined to be interviewed, but it was\u00a0understood\u00a0the group believed evidence of a massacre on the site was inconclusive.", "", "
The NSW Heritage Council supports the homestead being \"retained in its current, highly significant location with a curtilage around its equally significant cultural landscape\".(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "
Independent review affirms significance
", "A newly released\u00a0independent heritage review commissioned by the NSW Department of Planning as part of its assessment for the mine extension determined the Ravensworth Estate was \"likely \u2026 to meet the threshold for state heritage significance for its historical heritage value\".", "The report concluded\u00a0that mining on the estate \"violates the traditional relationship between the Aboriginal peoples and their land\".", "The review found the option of moving the homestead to a nearby farm \"better preserves many more aspects of significance than the rebuilding at Broke\".", "\"It may be that the relocation partially mitigates the loss, but this is not evident in the statements of interviewed Wonnarua people,\" it said.", "", "
The layout of the homestead forms a U-shape, with service wings enclosing a courtyard at the rear.(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "
Historians weigh in
", "University of Newcastle history professor Lyndall Ryan, who has spent almost a decade cataloguing colonial frontier massacres for an online map, found evidence of a massacre further up the Hunter Valley, but not near the Ravensworth homestead.", "\"This is not to say that a massacre or massacres did not take place,\" she said.", "Lyn MacBain, who has\u00a0studied local history in Singleton for the past 30 years, said the homestead should stay put.", "\"It offers insights into the contestation between the traditional dwellers and early colonisation, the contestation between master and convict, the contestation between the land, agriculture\u00a0and industry,\" she said.", "", "
Jamie Lowe has been advocating for reform of Indigenous heritage laws.(Supplied: Eastern Maar Aboriginal Cooperation)
", "
Government, companies 'divide the group'
", "National Native Title Council chief executive\u00a0Jamie Lowe said lessons could be taken from the Juukan Gorge final report when assessing Aboriginal cultural heritage.", "\"There seems to be \u2026 some sort of view that Indigenous groups need to be reaching consensus on all matters,\" he said.", "\u00a0\"We're not dissimilar to other groups, Aboriginal and non-Aboriginal.", "", "
The complex also contains a barn, stables, privy, a men\u2019s quarters building, yard areas and paddock.(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "He said the absence of a recognised native title holder, as was the case in the Hunter Valley, could\u00a0further complicate claims.", "\"Government groups or industry might then find it's easier to divide the group because they pick their favourites and choose the people that they want to speak to,\" he said.", "Wading through the complexities of the situation is now the responsibility of Ms Ley.", "In response to the PCWP's application for Aboriginal heritage protection, she appointed an independent anthropologist to prepare a wide-ranging report.", "Ms Ley said a decision on the application would be made \"in the near future\"."]
